Class FlatsListRepository

java.lang.Object
sg.edu.ntu.sc2002.ay2425.fcsdGroup2.repository.FlatsListRepository
public class FlatsListRepository extends Object
Repository class for managing Flat entities. Handles loading, saving, and searching flats in Excel files.
